title: Can someone tell me the name of this font.
content:
Could someone please tell me the name of this font.

Thank you in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [382238\_10151362804066225\_1913250162\_n.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022111144/http:/typophile.com/files/382238_10151362804066225_1913250162_n.jpg) | 12.94 KB |
author: digitalvisionstudio

comments.content: seems like it is a rebuild font, not regular font type.... I dont know.

It is Kraken - Kraken Bold, Thin etc. designed by English designer Paul Huxen in 2009. Several freeware sites have it. See: [http://twiggy8520.deviantart.com/art/K-R-A-K-E-N-B-E-T-A-110796306](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022111144/http:/twiggy8520.deviantart.com/art/K-R-A-K-E-N-B-E-T-A-110796306 "http://twiggy8520.deviantart.com/art/K-R-A-K-E-N-B-E-T-A-110796306")
It is _not_ Kraken Bold. Not one of the glyphs matches exactly.
i suspect (and I could be totally off base) that it is custom based on the Museo family.

Nothing matches exactly as Jan says but you can get it from Kraken:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022111144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Space_3739.jpg)
Thanks guys, I could not find the exact same typeface and I wonder if it is Kraken perhaps modified a bit ??? If anyone happens to come across it and let me know it would be awesome. Thanks guys.
